Come join me for our Weekly breath circle üôèüèª. 

*What to expect:*
By changing the way we breathe, we change the way we live.  

Breathing is a powerful tool for transformation. Through intentional breathwork, we can release stuck energy, process emotions, and free ourselves from limiting patterns and beliefs. This practice creates space to live more fully, freely, and authentically.  

We‚Äôll begin with a guided meditation to ground ourselves and set our intention. Next, we‚Äôll do some gentle bodywork to help shift out of the mind and into the body. We‚Äôll move into active, connected breathing for about 40 minutes, followed by 20 minutes of integration/relaxation. 

*Please bring:*
Water (refills available)
Snack for afterwards
Sarong or scarf (fine if you forget)

*About me:*  
I‚Äôm Rose, a former midwife, coach, and trained breathwork facilitator. My own experience with breathwork showed me its incredible power to release old pain, reconnect with my body, and find greater clarity and joy. Now, I support others in exploring this transformative practice in a grounded, loving and approachable way. 
 
There are some contra-indications for transformative breathwork. Please read them here: https://www.cradlecoaching.nl/en/ademcoaching
